note.p: Birth: Erode, near Kumbakonam, Tanjore district, Madras province, India (22 December 1887)
Death: Chetput, near Madras, India (26 April 1920)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1921 vol 99 pp xiii-xxix signed by Godfrey Harold Hardy

D A B Young, 'Ramanujan's Illness' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 107-119, plate
